check.name: Vertical Positional Accuracy Value
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Vertical Positional Accuracy Value concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept VerticalPositionalAccuracyValue is present."
if(VerticalPositionalAccuracyValue is not None and len(str(VerticalPositionalAccuracyValue)) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "VerticalPositionalAccuracyValue concept is not present"
return False

dialect.name: Dryad Data Package and Data File Modules
ISO 19115 and ISO 19115-2 / ISO 19139 and ISO 19139-2
